title: Hands-On Exercise 2
description: Today's Adventure: Geospatial Data Wrangling with R! Using the sf package, let's learn the ropes of handling geospatial data in R: from importing to projection, and even a bit of EDA

title: In-Class Exercise 2
description: In this hands-on exercise, I learned how to handle geospatial data in R by using the sf package.
